## What is ImmutableType?

ImmutableType is a decentralized journalism platform built on Flow EVM Mainnet. It enables immutable, transferable identity verification for journalists and readers through on-chain NFTs.

## Key Features

- ✅ Multi-wallet support (MetaMask, Flow EVM Wallet)
- ✅ Profile NFTs with tiered verification
- ✅ Bookmark NFTs for source verification
- ✅ Token-gated features (BUFFAFLOW integration)
- ✅ EIP-6963 wallet discovery

## Getting Started

```bash
# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/ImmutableType/immutable5.git
cd immutable5

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Set up environment variables
cp .env.example .env.local
# Edit .env.local with your configuration

# Run development server
npm run dev
```

See [Installation Guide](../docs/installation.md) for detailed setup.

## Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript
- **Blockchain**: Flow EVM Mainnet
- **Web3**: ethers.js 6, MetaMask SDK
- **Smart Contracts**: Solidity 0.8+
